{
  productArea(id:"Mocked-001"){
    id
    name
    dataproducts {
      name
    }
    teams {
      name
      dataproducts {
        name
      }
    }
  }
}

RETURNS

{
  "data": {
    "productArea": {
      "id": "Mocked-001",
      "name": "Mocked Produktomr√•de",
      "dataproducts": [
        {
          "name": "Updated Name"
        }
      ],
      "teams": [
        {
          "name": "team",
          "dataproducts": []
        },
        {
          "name": "nada",
          "dataproducts": [
            {
              "name": "Updated Name"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "aura",
          "dataproducts": []
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
